special-quality.name: Glasses
special-quality.description: You wear glasses, and can’t use contact lenses. The frame design can be whatever you want, and this can include a monocle.

special-quality.name: Sunglasses
special-quality.description: You always wear sunglasses or mirrorshades. As a rule, you don’t take these off.

special-quality.name: Furrowed Brows
special-quality.description: Your brows are always furrowed, like you’re in a bad mood.

special-quality.name: Quiet
special-quality.description: You have a cool, subtle demeanor. No, there are no rules regarding how often you speak.

special-quality.name: My Pace
special-quality.description: You like to live life at your own particular tempo, and you’re always calm and laid-back. This does not affect your attributes.

special-quality.name: Shibui
special-quality.description: Most butlers are well-kept and affable gentleman. But you are beyond that. Think Sean Connery on his best days.

special-quality.name: Brown Skin
special-quality.description: Your skin is a dark brown color, either natural or suntan.

special-quality.name: Narrow Eyes
special-quality.description: You have narrow eyes. They make it look like you’re smiling. What you’re really feeling is another matter entirely.

special-quality.name: Knight Talk
special-quality.description: You speak like a knight of old, saying “thou art” and such a lot.

special-quality.name: A Woman
special-quality.description: You’re actually a woman dressed as a man. Or you could be a hermaphrodite or something. You may roll for your other Special Qualities on the maids’ Special Quality table if you wish.

special-quality.name: Giant
special-quality.description: You’re huge, more than two meters tall.

special-quality.name: Muscular
special-quality.description: Your body is like a work of art, shrouded as it is in an armor of muscle.

special-quality.name: Attractive
special-quality.description: One or more of the maids finds you attractive, if a little unapproachable because of your position

special-quality.name: Misshapen Body
special-quality.description: Some part of your body has suffered damage or is otherwise abnormal. You might have one arm, a strangely bent arm, or otherwise be misshapen.

special-quality.name: Android
special-quality.description: You’re not human, but rather a human-looking robot. Parts of your body are very obviously artificial.

special-quality.name: Vampire
special-quality.description: You are a vampire, with long fangs. Be sure to act... vampiric.

special-quality.name: White Eyes
special-quality.description: Your eyes are almost completely white and have no pupils. Or, your eyes might always be glowing.

special-quality.name: Emaciated
special-quality.description: You have long, thin limbs and an emaciated body. Your figure reminds people of a spider or a wire frame.

special-quality.name: Bishonen
special-quality.description: Not only are you attractive, but women - and men - adore you. There’s a good chance that you’re also romantically attracted to members of the same sex.

special-quality.name: Sadist
special-quality.description: You’re excited by causing mental (or physical) pain and suffering to others.

special-quality.name: Sibling
special-quality.description: You have a relationship with one of the other Maids: You are siblings.

special-quality.name: Sportsman
special-quality.description: Pick a sport. You are a legend at playing it. The more elegant the sport, the better (fencing, polo, cricket, etc)

special-quality.name: Patchwork
special-quality.description: Your body is covered with stitching scars.

special-quality.name: One Eye
special-quality.description: You have only one eye. You’re free to decide whether you wear an eye patch, and if so its design.

special-quality.name: Burns
special-quality.description: Your face, body, etc. are covered with painful-looking scars from burns.

special-quality.name: Masochist
special-quality.description: You’re excited by being caused pain and suffering by others.

special-quality.name: Former Mercenary
special-quality.description: You were once a mercenary, constantly moving from battlefield to battlefield. You haven’t forgotten any of your experiences or instincts from that time.

special-quality.name: Amnesiac
special-quality.description: You’ve lost your memory from when you were young. (The GM should come up with something to reveal during the game).

special-quality.name: Wanted
special-quality.description: The police want to question you about a serious crime. The player can decide whether the character is actually guilty.

special-quality.name: Secretly an Assassin
special-quality.description: While you put on the façade of being a butler, underneath you’re a coldhearted killer on the side.

special-quality.name: Hacker
special-quality.description: Aside from being a butler, you’re a hacker, breaking into computer systems.

special-quality.name: Doctor
special-quality.description: In addition to being a butler, you have the skills of a doctor or a pharmacist.

special-quality.name: Shadow Clan
special-quality.description: You’re a member of one of the secret organizations that has existed throughout history. You could be a ninja, a magician, one of the knights templar, a kung fu assassin, etc.

special-quality.name: Mummy
special-quality.description: You’re actually an animated corpse. Your complexion is bad, and you have conspicuous wounds.

special-quality.name: Priest
special-quality.description: You can use magic grounded in some kind of religious ceremony. You must use various types of religious symbols to do so.

special-quality.name: Cyborg
special-quality.description: You were made into a cyborg by an evil secret society or another country. You can have some special features if you wish.
